root: ^Hello there! Are you tired of dealing with outdated, unreliable toilets?

Follow_me: ^Allow me to introduce you to our state-of-the-art toilet models.
^These toilets are not only sleek and stylish but also engineered for maximum performance and efficiency.
^Our toilets feature advanced flushing technology that ensures a powerful yet water-saving flush every time.
^Maintenance is a breeze with our toilets.
^They're designed with easy-to-clean surfaces and durable materials that resist stains and odors.
^Plus, they're built to last, so you won't have to worry about frequent repairs or replacements.
Hey_Hey: ^Alright, i think you need to go
